Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends Warren county's additional mortgage recording tax authorization until December 1, 2023
Summary: Extends Warren county's additional mortgage recording tax authorization until December 1, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 368 of the laws of 2008, amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Warren to impose an additional mortgage recording tax, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
